item.description:
Let's check out Boston's only Hot Pot & Sushi Sports Bar!

We will gather for drinks and oysters at 6:30pm and then dinner at 7pm. Â They have $1 oyster special on Friday.

Parking is available on street and at the Dorchester Tire Parking Lot. Savin Hill T stop on the red line is a few blocks away.

For menu and additional info, please check out the below website:

http://www.vanshabubar.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation for party of 24 under Amanda.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Shabu/Sushi/Oysters Friday
